  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_495</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_495</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Sumas de palabras y otros</string>
            <string language="en">Verbal arithmetic and other puzzles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mündliche Arithmetik und andere Puzzlespiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arithmétique verbale et d'autres puzzles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aritmética verbal e outros enigmas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aritmetica verbale ed altri puzzle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεκτική αριθμητική και άλλοι γρίφοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones algunos ejemplos de rompecabezas numéricos. Por ejemplo, se estudian sumas con letras que representan números que hay que descubrir.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations with examples of numerical puzzles as, for example, sums of letters which represent numbers that the student has to discover.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">operations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">suma</string>
            <string language="en">addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rompecabezas</string>
            <string language="en">puzzle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrados numéricos</string>
            <string language="en">numerical squares</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welches Simulationen 
mit Beispielen der numerischen Puzzlespiele wie z.B. Summen Zeichen 
verwendet, welches Zahlen darstellt, die der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement ce qui utilise des 
simulations avec des exemples des puzzles numériques comme, par 
exemple, des sommes de lettres ce qui représente les nombres que 
l'étudiant doit découvrir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando qual usa simulações com 
exemplos de enigmas numéricos quanto, para ao exemplo, somas das 
letras qual representa os números que o estudante tem que descobrir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quale usa le simulazioni con 
gli esempi dei puzzle numerici come, per esempio, somme delle lettere 
quale rappresenta i numeri che l'allievo deve scoprire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
με τα παραδείγματα των αριθμητικών γρίφων όπως, παραδείγματος 
χάριν, ποσά των επιστολών που αντιπροσωπεύουν τους αριθμούς που ο
σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Operationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinzufügung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Puzzlespiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">numerische Quadrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exécutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ajout</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">puzzle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nombres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
